import React, {useEffect}from 'react' import NavBar from '../../Components/Navbar/NavBar' import {useParams,Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { fetchOrder } from '../../Features/Order' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import {ImagePath} from '../../Axios' import './Order.css' function Order() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const {id} = useParams() useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchOrder()) }, [dispatch]) const { OrderInfo } = useSelector(state => state.order) const Order = OrderInfo.find(x => x._id === id) console.log(Order) return (
